TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HostingEnvironment extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class HostingEnvironment Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class HostingEnvironment sealed : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 在 Managed 應用程式的應用程式定義域中向其提供應用程式管理功能和應用程式服務。

span.span: Provides application-management functions and application services to a managed application within its application domain.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個受管理的應用程式定義域中包含的靜態執行個體類別，可提供存取應用程式管理功能和應用程式服務。Each managed application domain contains a static instance of the class, which provides access to application-management functions and application services. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是會顯示可從應用程式資訊的網頁物件。The following code example is a webpage that displays the application information available from the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment/CS/hostingEnvironmentcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment/VB/hostingEnvironmentvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化物件。The constructor initializes the object. 的應用程式一次呼叫建構函式物件。The constructor is called only once by the application's object. 呼叫建構函式超過一次會造成擲回的例外狀況。Calling the constructor more than once will cause an exception to be thrown.

exception.span: 已多次呼叫 建構函式。

span.span: The constructor is called more than once.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式必須執行設定為高信任度，以存取屬性。The application must be running with set to high trust to access the property.

summary.span: 取得應用程式的根虛擬路徑。

span.span: Gets the root virtual path of the application.

value.span: 應用程式的根虛擬路徑 (結尾沒有斜線 (/))。

span.span: The root virtual path of the application with no trailing slash (/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性一律會傳回"`/"`做為傳回值的第一個字元。The property always returns "`/"` as the first character of the returned value. 如果應用程式位於網站根目錄中，只是傳回的值"`/"`。If the application is located in the root of the website, the return value is just "`/"`.

The current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DecrementBusyCount() cil managed

summary.span: 將裝載環境中的忙碌物件計數減少一個。

span.span: Reduces the count of busy objects in the hosted environment by one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當忙碌的已註冊的物件完成其工作時，它會呼叫方法來通知物件已完成處理並將的忙碌物件計數減少一個。When a busy registered object finishes its work, it calls the method to signal the object that it has completed processing and to reduce the count of busy objects by one. 如果忙碌的計數小於或等於零，裝載應用程式不會逾即使沒有任何暫止要求。If the busy count is greater than zero, the hosting application will not time out even if there are no pending requests. 必須呼叫方法每次呼叫方法。There must be a call to the method for each call to the method.

summary.span: 允許程式碼模擬不同使用者。

span.span: Allows code to impersonate a different user.

Public Shared Function Impersonate () As IDisposable

summary.span: 模擬由應用程式識別所表示的使用者。

span.span: Impersonates the user represented by the application identity.

returns.span: 物件，表示模擬前的 Windows 使用者，這個物件可以用於還原為原始使用者的內容。

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.
The process cannot impersonate.

summary.span: 模擬由指定虛擬路徑之組態設定所指定的使用者，或指定的使用者語彙基元。

span.span: Impersonates the user specified by the configuration settings for the specified virtual path, or the specified user token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會模擬後套用組態設定會影響指定的虛擬路徑中的所有項目所產生的使用者。The method impersonates the user that results after applying all elements in the configuration settings affecting the specified virtual path. 如果`identity`項目未指定虛擬路徑，方法來模擬指定的 Windows 帳戶。If an `identity` element is not specified for the virtual path, the method impersonates the specified Windows account.

span.span: The process cannot impersonate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊的物件訊號物件已經在執行和的忙碌物件計數增加一。Registered objects signal the object that it is running and to increase the count of busy objects by one. 如果忙碌的計數小於或等於零，裝載應用程式不會逾即使沒有任何暫止要求。If the busy count is greater than zero, the hosting application will not time out even if there are no pending requests. 必須呼叫方法每次呼叫方法。There must be a call to the method for each call to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object InitializeLifetimeService() cil managed
Public Overrides Function InitializeLifetimeService () As Object

summary.span: 藉由防止建立使用期，為 物件提供無限的存留期。

span.span: Gives the object an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫其基底類別中的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它會一律傳回`null`並防止建立會限制的使用期物件存留期。It always returns `null` and prevents a lease from being created that would limit the object's lifetime.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void InitiateShutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 開始關閉與這個主機關聯的 Web 應用程式，並從系統中移除註冊的物件。

span.span: Starts shutting down the web application associated with this host and removes registered objects from the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來停止 web 應用程式定義域，並移除任何物件向方法。Use the method to stop a web application domain and remove any objects registered with the method. 這個方法會立即傳回，在完成關機之前。This method returns immediately, before the shutdown is complete. 每個已註冊的物件上呼叫方法並傳遞的參數設定為`false`允許每個已註冊的物件，以非同步方式關閉。The method is called on each registered object with the passed parameter set to `false` to allow each registered object to shut down asynchronously. 在等候中指定的時間量之後`shutdownTimeout`屬性的組態項目傳遞的參數設定為使用一次呼叫方法`true`剩餘的每個已註冊物件。After waiting for the amount of time specified in the `shutdownTimeout` attribute of the configuration element, the method is called again with the passed parameter set to `true` for each registered object remaining. 當所有已註冊的物件完成後，正在關閉，物件關閉應用程式定義域。Once all registered objects have finished shutting down, the objects shuts down the application domain.

summary.span: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更新版本中支援]

summary.span: 排程可在背景中執行的工作，不受任何要求影響。

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

summary.span: 此多載方法不會讓 或 從呼叫者流入被呼叫者。

span.span: This overloaded method doesn’t flow the or from the caller to the callee.

summary.span: 因此，這些物件的成員 (例如 屬性) 都不會從呼叫者流入被呼叫者。

span.span: Therefore, members of those objects, such as the property, will not flow from the caller to the callee.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void QueueBackgroundWorkItem(class System.Action`1<valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken> workItem) cil managed
Public Shared Sub QueueBackgroundWorkItem (workItem As Action(Of CancellationToken))

span.span: A unit of execution.

summary.span: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更新版本中支援]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]

summary.span: 排程可在背景中執行的工作，不受任何要求影響。

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於正常的執行緒集區工作項目，ASP.NET 可以追蹤的多少工作目前正在透過此 API 登錄項目和 ASP.NET 執行階段會嘗試延遲 AppDomain 關閉直到這些工作項目都已完成執行。Differs from a normal ThreadPool work item in that ASP.NET can keep track of how many work items registered through this API are currently running, and the ASP.NET runtime will try to delay AppDomain shutdown until these work items have finished executing. 這個 API 不能呼叫 ASP.NET managed AppDomain 之外。This API cannot be called outside of an ASP.NET-managed AppDomain. 信號提供的 CancellationToken 會在應用程式正在關機而關閉。The provided CancellationToken will be signaled when the application is shutting down. 會傳回工作的回呼。工作項目將會被視為已完成回呼傳回時。 takes a Task-returning callback; the work item will be considered finished when the callback returns.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void QueueBackgroundWorkItem(class System.Func`2<valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken, class System.Threading.Tasks.Task> workItem) cil managed
Public Shared Sub QueueBackgroundWorkItem (workItem As Func(Of CancellationToken, Task))

span.span: A unit of execution.

summary.span: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更新版本中支援]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]

summary.span: 排程可在背景中執行的工作，不受任何要求影響。

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於正常的執行緒集區工作項目，ASP.NET 可以追蹤的多少工作目前正在透過此 API 登錄項目和 ASP.NET 執行階段會嘗試延遲 AppDomain 關閉直到這些工作項目都已完成執行。Differs from a normal ThreadPool work item in that ASP.NET can keep track of how many work items registered through this API are currently running, and the ASP.NET runtime will try to delay AppDomain shutdown until these work items have finished executing. 這個 API 不能呼叫 ASP.NET managed AppDomain 之外。This API cannot be called outside of an ASP.NET-managed AppDomain. 信號提供的 CancellationToken 會在應用程式正在關機而關閉。The provided CancellationToken will be signaled when the application is shutting down. 會傳回工作的回呼。工作項目將會被視為已完成時傳回的工作轉換至終端機的狀態。 takes a Task-returning callback; the work item will be considered finished when the returned Task transitions to a terminal state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterObject(class System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject obj) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RegisterObject (obj As IRegisteredObject)

span.span: The object to register.

summary.span: 將物件置於應用程式的註冊物件清單中。

span.span: Places an object in the list of registered objects for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓目前的應用程式定義域來建立、 管理和摧毀目前的應用程式定義域內的物件之外的方法。The class enables methods outside the current application domain to create, manage, and destroy objects inside the current application domain. 方法用來向裝載的環境中的先前建立的物件。The method is used to register previously created objects with the hosting environment. 物件向方法必須實作介面。Objects registered with the method must implement the interface. 若要使用的已註冊的物件，請遵循下列步驟：To use a registered object, follow these steps: 1. 藉由呼叫建立的已註冊物件的新執行個體方法。Create a new instance of your registered object by calling the method. 2. 呼叫的特定類型的方法來初始化新的物件。Call a type-specific method to initialize your new object. 在初始設定方法，呼叫方法，將物件加入至已註冊的物件清單。In the initialization method, call the method to add the object to the list of registered objects. 3. 呼叫傳回已註冊的物件時所需的方法。Call the method to return the registered object when required. 4. 當您想要停止您的物件時，呼叫方法。When you wish to stop your object, call the method. 方法會呼叫方法。The method in turn calls the method. 5. 在方法，讓物件呼叫方法。In the method, have your object call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是實作`Start`註冊物件的方法。The following code example is an implementation of a `Start` method for a registered object. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的介面的概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the interface overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#2)]

param.name: virtualPathProvider
param.span: 要加入至編譯系統的新 執行個體。

span.span: The new instance to add to the compilation system.

summary.span: 使用 ASP.NET 編譯系統註冊新的 執行個體。

span.span: Registers a new instance with the ASP.NET compilation system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將指定應用程式的清單執行個體的虛擬路徑提供者。The method adds the specified instance to the application's list of virtual-path providers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例屬於登錄自訂應用程式啟動方法編譯系統具有執行個體。The following code example is part of an application startup method that registers a custom instance with the compilation system. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/AppStart.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/AppStart.vb#11)]

summary.span: 設定目前執行緒的文化特性 (Culture) 資訊。

span.span: Sets culture information for the current thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IDisposable SetCultures() cil managed
Public Shared Function SetCultures () As IDisposable

summary.span: 將目前執行緒設為應用程式組態檔中指定的文化特性。

span.span: Sets the current thread to the culture specified in the application configuration file.

returns.span: 物件，表示變更前的文化特性，這個物件可用於還原為先前的文化特性。

span.span: An object that represents the culture prior to changing; this object can be used to revert to the previous culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將目前的執行緒設定中指定的文化特性[全球化項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7)應用程式的組態檔中的項目。The method sets the current thread to the culture specified in the [globalization Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7) element in the application's configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IDisposable SetCultures(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function SetCultures (virtualPath As String) As IDisposable

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 包含文化特性資訊的路徑。

span.span: The path that contains the culture information.

summary.span: 將目前執行緒設為指定虛擬路徑的文化特性。

span.span: Sets the current thread to the culture of the specified virtual path.

returns.span: 物件，表示變更前的文化特性，這個物件可用於還原為先前的文化特性。

span.span: An object that represents the culture prior to changing; this object can be used to revert to the previous culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定目前執行緒文化特性套用影響指定的虛擬路徑的組態檔中的所有項目後所產生。The method sets the current thread to the culture that results after applying all elements in the configuration files affecting the specified virtual path.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Event StopListening As EventHandler

summary.span: [僅在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 中支援]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 only]

summary.span: 發生於與此主機相關聯的背景工作處理序或應用程式集區，已停止接聽新要求且最終將關閉時。

span.span: Occurs when the worker process or application pool associated with this host has stopped listening for new requests and will eventually shut down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式集區和其相關聯的背景工作處理序正在關閉 iis 時，例如當應用程式集區已達到排定的回收時間間隔，IIS 會通知應用程式正在關機而關閉 ASP.NET 執行階段和背景工作處理序應用程式集區會停止接聽新的要求。When an application pool and its associated worker processes are being shut down by IIS, for example when an application pool has reached a scheduled recycle interval, IIS notifies the ASP.NET runtime that the application is shutting down and the worker process for the application pool stops listening for new requests. 應用程式，例如使用長時間執行的要求， [SignalR](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=285432)應用程式可以接聽事件和 IIS 已啟動的應用程式關閉時正常關閉其長時間執行的作業集區，及其相關聯的背景工作處理序。Applications that use long-running requests, for example [SignalR](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=285432) applications, can listen for the event and gracefully shut down their long-running operations when IIS has initiated the shutdown of an application pool and its associated worker processes. > [!WARNING] > 有幾個開發人員在實作時必須考慮的設計考量事件：There are several design considerations that a developer must consider when implementing the event: > > 1. 事件只適用於已設定為使用 IIS integrated 的管線的應用程式。The event is only available for applications that are configured to use the IIS integrated pipeline. > 2. 開發人員必須不會擲回錯誤，從其實作; 擲回錯誤，則會有無法預期的結果。Developers must not throw errors from their implementations; throwing errors will have unpredictable results. > 3. 由於在 ASP.NET 中的作業並行的本質，也不會保證將會呼叫 ASP.NET事件之後已由開發人員實作。Due to the concurrent nature of operations within ASP.NET, there is no guarantee that ASP.NET will call a event once it has been implemented by a developer. > 4. 事件可以與其他同時執行通知。The event can execute concurrently with other notifications. > 5. 開發人員必須注意可能關閉 ASP.NET 應用程式定義域時其事件時執行和設計其實作來處理該可能性。Developers need to be aware that ASP.NET may shut down the application domain while their event is executing and design their implementations to handle that possibility. > 6. 事件處理常式必須不會封鎖。封鎖實作將會導致死結，而且 IIS 會終止背景工作處理序時快速失敗保護間隔為止。 event handlers must not block; blocking implementations will result in deadlocks, and IIS will terminate the worker process when the rapid fail protection interval is reached.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UnregisterObject(class System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject obj) cil managed
Public Shared Sub UnregisterObject (obj As IRegisteredObject)

span.span: The object to remove.

summary.span: 移除於應用程式之註冊物件清單中的物件。

span.span: Removes an object from the list of registered objects for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓目前的應用程式定義域來建立、 管理和摧毀目前的應用程式定義域內的物件之外的方法。The class enables methods outside the current application domain to create, manage, and destroy objects inside the current application domain. 方法用來裝載環境中移除先前註冊的物件。The method is used to remove previously registered objects from the hosting environment. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是註冊物件的方法。The following code example is the method for a registered object. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的介面的概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the interface overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property VirtualPathProvider As VirtualPathProvider
public: static property System::Web::Hosting::VirtualPathProvider ^ VirtualPathProvider { System::Web::Hosting::VirtualPathProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個應用程式的虛擬路徑提供者。

span.span: Gets the virtual path provider for this application.

value.span: 這個應用程式的 執行個體。

span.span: The instance for this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當一個以上註冊執行個體，物件管理的呼叫鏈結。When more than one instance is registered, the object manages the call chain. 您無法控制稱為虛擬路徑提供者的順序。You cannot control the order in which virtual path providers are called.
